column5: If you wanted to go to a drive in lake that had great Smallmouth fishing, good fishing for large Pike and enough Walleye to eat. Which lake would you go to?
Lake of the Woods has it all. Check out http://www.buenavistaresort.com/
Honestly, June on lake of the woods can just be amazing small mouth.
Rainy or Lake of the woods I have never fished either but know guys that have.
Endless Trophy Smallmouth...big pike, muskies, lakers and walleyes. Check it out www.canadafish.com
[font color=green size=3][b] Wabaskang Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby

Steve: We go to LOTW in June every year specifically for smallmouth. If you decide to go there let me know and I can get you soem more details. We fish the Sabaskong Bay area of the lake and have heard that it is not the best?? Max
